attributes.action: Amend the legal aid funding to only those who have British Citizenship
attributes.additional_details: No money should be spent on any person without British Citizenship.
attributes.background: Those people who have been stripped of British Citizenship, their family or agents should not be allowed access to Legal Aid. It is not fair to those with British Citizenship who cannot currently access funding in this Country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/656581
